html: (1 Nephi 21:26; 2 Nephi 6:18)."All flesh shall know that I the Lord am thy Saviour and thy Redeemer, the Mighty One of Jacob." There will be no equivocating at His coming; both the wicked and the righteous shall acknowledge Him as the God of Israel and the One who wrought the atonement. (See BICQ, 188-93.)
